text: Louis Bordo (June 2, 1920 - February 27, 2001) was an American gymnast. He competed in eight events at the 1948 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2001 deaths Category:American male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of the United States Category:Gymnasts at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia
title: Louis Bordo
